Here's my proposal for the syntax:

// Compare the value of the preference, i.e. Preferences.get
'browser.startup.page'|preferenceValue == 3

// preferenceValue can take a default value as an optional argument, which 
// defaults to `undefined`.
'devtools.chrome.enabled'|preferenceValue(false) == true

// Compare if the preference is user set, i.e. Preferences.isSet
'dom.ipc.processCount'|preferenceIsUserSet != true

// Compare if the preference has _any_ value, whether it's user-set or default, 
// i.e. Preferences.has
'xpinstall.signatures.required'|preferenceExists == false

@andymikulski @mythmon @gregglind @MattGrimes @rayborn Last call for feedback on the syntax?
